dialogue.text: Uh oh, I know that look on your face, Jane. Spit it out, what do you need?
You know me well, Fiona! <3 You remember my friend Sylvia, right?
Yeah, the one you borrowed a fishing rod and broke it...
Yeah, that one! It's her initiation day soon and I want to give her a special gift
Her favorite fish, Spookish, would be a perfect initiation gift
Problem is I'm too weak to fish one myself
Bring me one and in exchange I'll give you some gel and my eternal gratitude
Sure, I've got your back. Be right back
